comments.comment: Raathriye gam valata kadaa vedee velak era velak kaalaa peduru vala nidaa siti duppath niraayudha gam vesiyan kiri daruvan pavaa kadu kinisi valin kapaa kotaa meruu evun ape daruvoda? Gebini mav varunge badaval palalaa daruvan eliyata aran kapalaa kotalaa marapu un ape daruvoda? Thamunge genita daruvanta ehema kalaa nam unta monavada kiyanne?   Ethakota e merum ke ahinsakayo kavuda? E ape daruvo neveyida?  Maha maga yana bus navathvaa niraayudha mageen bassavalaa pelata vedi thiyalaa marapu un ape daruvoda?  E merum ke ahinsakayo  kavuda? Maruvoda? Ehema bus eken bassana kota eka ammaa kenek thamange kiri ketiyaa mallakata damaa indagena siti asuna yata hangalaa indalaa pasuva  bus eka sodisi kala hamudaavata hamba velaa thibunaa.  Un thena thena thibba bomba valata ahu vune kavuda? Daruvoda maruvoda? Mehema minee marapu reeri yakun maraa thamage jeevitha ath paa es kan pudaa rata vesiyan beraa gath hamudaava Maruvoda? daruvoda? viruvoda? Deviyoda?
